snippet.title: ENDLESS Legend 2 - Reveal Trailer | Fantasy 4X
snippet.description:
ENDLESS Legend 2 builds on the first ENDLESS Legend from 2014, pushing turn-based strategy to new heights (or should that be, new depths) by bringing players back to the studio’s unique setting with a new mysterious world, unique factions, and more epic storytelling. Write your legend and unveil the secrets of a dreamlike ocean-planet on the verge of extinction.

➤ Wishlist on STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3407390/ENDLESS_Legend_2/

Check out all Hooded Horse strategy games:
➤ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/HoodedHorse

Follow us on social media:

➤ Twitter: https://twitter.com/HoodedHorseInc
➤ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HoodedHorse/

https://www.youtube.com/HoodedHorse
